title: Nispira Activated Carbon Water Filter Replacement Compatible with Portable Coffee Maker COFFEEBOXX Jobsite Singel Serve, 6 Filters
features: Premium activated carbon water filter compatible with COFFEEBOXX Coffee Maker.
It help remove chlorine, odors, calcium, and other water impurities prior to brewing to give a much better taste to your coffee.
Nispira premium filters use finer granular activated charcoal to enhance the filtering process for better taste.
6 filters pack. Suggested replacement after 90 days or more often if you have hard water.
100% customer satisfaction guaranteed. Quality meets or exceeds leading national brand
